column5: What species are in the reservoir? What techniques should I be using?  Thanks,  Matt.
I'd probably fish Mill Pond myself...
bass, perch and rock bass so far for me, oh and pumpkinseed too
See if you can find it at the below link  http://www.web2.mnr.gov.on.ca/fish_online/fishing/fishingExplorer_en.html
Halton Conservation advertise (TROUT) in Kelso. Laugh out loud or just maybe cry! They have not stocked any trout in this pot hole in (25)years.
i thought there was just little pumpkinseed and carp in that pond?

I haven't lived in Milton since 1985.. but there's crappie, rock bass, cat fish, even some Bass in there... as well as the fact they stock 1000 Rainbows every year for the kids tourney in April/May, although many claim the lake can't sustain them.
